name: Image.ResizingMode
desc: The modes that SwiftUI uses to resize an image to fit within its containing view.

items.name: case stretch
items.desc: A mode to enlarge or reduce the size of an image so that it fills the available space.

items.name: case tile
items.desc: A mode to repeat the image at its original size, as many times as necessary to fill the available space.

items.name: static func == (Image.ResizingMode, Image.ResizingMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two resizing modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two resizing modes are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the resizing mode by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the resizing mode.
